title: Drop-In Sketching (August 3)
hero_caption: Ellsworth Kelly. Ralph Coburn, 1949. Collection of the Ellsworth Kelly Studio and Jack Shear. ©️ Ellsworth Kelly Foundation.
short_description: Take inspiration from the whimsical portrait studies of Ellsworth Kelly and join artist d. Wright in the Prints and Drawings galleries to make line portraits using blind contour techniques.
list_description: Take inspiration from the whimsical portrait studies of Ellsworth Kelly and join artist d. Wright in the Prints and Drawings galleries to make line portraits using blind contour techniques.
description: Take inspiration from the whimsical pieces in Ellsworth Kelly: Portrait Drawings and join artist d. Wright in the galleries for this month's drop-in sketch. Participants will practice their observational drawing skills to make line portraits using blind contour techniques, applying both close looking and hand-eye coordination to compose playful portraits in conversation with Kelly’s work.
